skins.shipDescription: Sixth ship of the Nagara-class light cruisers, Abukuma.
skins.selfIntroduction: Nagara-class light cruiser, Abukuma. I've spent most of my time in the First Torpedo Squadron. Although I look aggressive, I actually prefer other things like fishing and just cruising around... just like when I was at Kiska. Perhaps protecting others is a more suitable job for me.
skins.acquisition: Hi, Commander... I'm Abukuma. What are you looking at? My horns? Don't mistake me for Kitakami or Oi...
skins.login: Welcome back. Want to try some fresh torpedoes?
skins.details: Don't push yourself too much, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, shall we go fishing? How about a game of chess?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My name seems a bit complicated, but it's actually easy to read. Why don't you try it?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Dress up? Oh... these socks are actually pretty easy to take off. Want to try yourself?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Want to have a taste of my torpedoes, Commander?

skins.shipDescription: Combat retrofit complete! First Torpedo Squadron flagship, Abukuma, ready to sortie any time!
skins.acquisition: Combat retrofit complete! First Torpedo Squadron flagship, Abukuma, ready to sortie any time!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Have you finally memorized my name? Just read it out. You can give it a few tries~
skins.secretaryIdle3: My expression seems a bit softer now? It's because I like the fleet and the Commander more than I did before~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, did you call for me?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey! Commander, you're going to be eating torpedoes if you keep this up!
